Texts.Eng: Excellent, you did wonderfully! We're one sixth of the way there, dear. Nothing to sniff at. And now we have ^orange;Nuru^reset; to help us, too.
I have received coordinates for the ^orange;The Ceremonial Hunting Caverns^reset;. ^green;Use the mission interface^reset; to access the location.

The clues you collected reveal that the ^orange;Floran artifact^reset; is enshrined in ^orange;The Ceremonial Hunting Caverns^reset;. Judging from what I've found out, you'll need to ^green;compete in a ritual hunt to get it^reset;. I've given SAIL the co-ordinates you need. Be careful dear.
